\93And the counsel of peace shall be between them both.\94 The love of the Father, no less than of the Son, is the fountain of salvation for the lost race. Said Jesus to his disciples, before he went away, \93I say not unto you, that I will pray 
417
the Father for you; for the Father himself loveth you.\94 [John 16:26, 27.] God was \93in Christ, reconciling the world unto himself.\94 [2 Corinthians 5:19.] And in the ministration in the sanctuary above, \93the counsel of peace shall be between them both.\94 \93God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.\94 [John 3:16.]
